law.catch_line: Immunity from personal liability for board members and agents for official acts.
law.text: Members of the board and its agents shall be immune from personal liability in any action, civil or criminal, which is based upon any official act or acts performed reasonably and in good faith by the board member, agent, or employee.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 352, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1994.
